plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. Bunnies like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I am orange sometimes!
🐰 Rabbits love to munch on me!
🌱 I grow in a garden.

plant.question: I am round and red, and grow on a plant. You can eat me in a salad. What am I?

hints.text: 🔴 I am the color of fire trucks.
🪴 I grow on a vine.
☀️ I like sunshine.

plant.question: I am tall and have many leaves. Birds like to build their homes in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐿️ Squirrels like me too!
🌳 I have a big trunk.
🍃 I lose my leaves in the fall sometimes.

plant.question: I am colorful and smell sweet. Bees like to visit me. What am I?

hints.text: 💐 You can give me as a gift.
🌷 I can be different colors, like pink, yellow or red.
🐝 I need bees to help me grow.

plant.question: I am long and green, and grow on a vine. You can eat me as a pickle. What am I?

hints.text: 🥒 I am crunchy!
☀️ I grow best in warm weather.
🧪 People put me in salty water to make pickles.

plant.question: I am yellow and grow on a cob. You can pop me to make a yummy snack. What am I?

hints.text: 🍿 I am often eaten at the movie theater.
🚜 Farmers grow me in big fields.
🌽 I have rows of kernels all in a line.

plant.question: I have a hard shell and grow on a tree. Squirrels love to bury me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌰 I come in many kinds!
🐿️ Squirrels collect me in the autumn.
🍂 I fall from trees when the weather gets colder.

plant.question: I am green and prickly and grow in the desert. I don't need much water. What am I?

hints.text: 🏜️ I live in hot, dry places.
🌵 Some kinds have beautiful flowers.
🦔 Be careful when you touch me!

plant.question: I am long and orange, and grow underground. Rabbits and horses both love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I help you see in the dark!
🥕 I grow under the dirt.
🥕 I'm a root vegetable.

plant.question: I am a big fruit with a green rind and red inside. I am very juicy in the summer. What am I?

hints.text: 🍉 I am often eaten at picnics.
🌱 I grow on a vine.
☀️ I am round or oval and can be very big!

transport.question: I go beep beep! I have wheels and take you places. What am I?

hints.text: 🚗 Grown-ups drive me.
🚦 I stop at red lights.
📣 I can be loud and honk.

transport.question: I float on the water. I can be big or small. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I travel on the sea.
⚓ I need an anchor to stop.
👪 People can ride on me.

transport.question: I go choo choo! I ride on tracks. What am I?

hints.text: 🚂 I carry many people at once.
🚏 I stop at train stations.
💨 I can make lots of steam.

transport.question: I fly in the sky. I have wings. What am I?

hints.text: ✈️ I take people to far away places.
☁️ I fly above the clouds.
💺 People sit in seats inside me.

transport.question: I have two wheels and pedals. You use your feet to make me go. What am I?

hints.text: 🚲 I need a helmet to stay safe.
🔔 You can ring a bell on me.
💪 You use your legs to push me.

transport.question: I am big and yellow. I take kids to school. What am I?

hints.text: 🚌 I stop to pick up children.
🛑 I have a stop sign that comes out.
👧 Boys and girls ride in me.

transport.question: I carry lots of things. I am big and drive on the road. What am I?

hints.text: 🚚 I have many wheels.
📦 I deliver packages to people.
🛣️ I drive long distances.

transport.question: I have two wheels and an engine. You need a helmet to ride me. What am I?

hints.text: 🏍️ I go very fast.
🧤 You need to wear gloves to drive me.
🚦 I am smaller than a car but faster than a bicycle.

transport.question: I am a house on wheels. People can sleep in me when they go camping. What am I?

hints.text: 🏕️ I am like a small moving home.
👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 Families use me to travel.
🏞️ You can park me in nature.

transport.question: I fly in space. I take astronauts to the moon. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 I am very powerful.
👨‍🚀 People who visit space use me.
✨ I travel to other planets.
